net.ddns.mucaho.jnetrobust
Class Logger

java.lang.Object
  net.ddns.mucaho.jnetrobust.Logger

public abstract class Logger
extends java.lang.Object

Abstract class which is able to handle protocol specific logging. Implementations of this class have to implement the log method.

static class Logger.LoggingEvent
          Enum representing all possible logging event descriptions.

Method Detail

log

public abstract void log(java.lang.String description,
                         java.lang.Object... params)
Log changes in the protocol's state.

Parameters:
description - the description of the log event, matches one of the logging events
params - zero or more features that are logged

public static Logger getConsoleLogger(java.lang.String name)

Parameters:
